info.description:
Below is a detailed description of the REST API of the OpenBaton Network  Function  Virtualization  Orchestrator(NFVO).      
To  send  REST  requests  to  the  NFVO  you  first  have  to  get  a  token  which  you  then  have  to  pass  in  the header of every request. You can retrieve a token by executing this curl request: 
 curl -v -u openbatonOSClient:secret -X POST http://localhost:8080/oauth/token -H "Accept:application/json" -d "username=admin&password=openbaton&grant_type=password"
info.title: NFVO REST API

post.summary: Download a Network Service CSAR from the Open Baton Marketplace
post.description: The Request Body takes a JSON with the parameter link which holds the URL to the CSAR on the Open Baton Marketplace

post.summary: Add a CSAR Network Service
post.description: The request parameter 'file' specifies an archive which is needed to onboard a Network Service as CSAR. On how to create such an archive refer to: http://openbaton.github.io/documentation/tosca-CSAR-onboarding/

get.summary: Retrieving all Vim Instances
get.description: This method returns the list of all the VimInstances on-boarded in this project identified by the header project-id

post.summary: Adding a Vim Instance
post.description: Takes a Vim Instance json in the request body

get.summary: Returns the data about an Image from the Vim Instance
get.description: Retrieve the data for a specific image on the Vim Instance which id is specified in the URL

put.summary: Updates the data of an image on the Vim Instance
put.description: Updates an image to the Vim Instance with id specified in the URL

delete.summary: Remove an image on the Vim Instance
delete.description: Remove the specified by id image from the vim instance

get.summary: Retrieve a Vim Instance
get.description: Returns the Vim Instance JSON belonging to the id specified in the URL

put.description: Takes a Vim Instance as JSON and updates the Vim Instance with the id specified in the URL

delete.description: Deletes the Vim Instance belonging to the id specified in the URL

get.summary: Retrieve the data about images on a Vim Instance
get.description: Retrieve the data for all images on the Vim Instance which id is specified in the URL

post.summary: Adds an image to the Vim Instance
post.description: Adds an image to the Vim Instance with id specified in the URL

get.summary: Refreshes the data about the Vim Instance
get.description: Refreshes the data about the Vim Instance and returns it

get.summary: Retrieve all Keys
get.description: Returns all the keys created for the project with id specified in the header

post.summary: Importing a Key
post.description: Pass the Key as JSON content in the Request Body. The Key should contain the name and public key.

post.summary: Generate a Key
post.description: Generates a new key for the given project from a name that is passed in the Request Body

post.summary: Remove multiple Keys
post.description: The ids of the Keys is passed in a list in the Request Body

get.summary: Retrieve a key
get.description: The id of the key is specified in the URL

delete.description: The id of the key is specified in the URL

get.summary: Get all NSDs from a project
get.description: Returns all Network Service Descriptors onboarded in the project with the specified id

post.summary: Adding a Network Service Descriptor
post.description: POST request with Network Service Descriptor as JSON content of the request body

post.summary: Adding a NSD from the marketplace
post.description: POST request with the a JSON object in the request body containing a field named link

post.summary: Removing multiple Network Service Descriptors
post.description: Delete Request takes a list of Network Service Descriptor ids

post.summary: Adding a NSD from the marketplace
post.description: POST request with the a JSON object in the request body containing a field named link

post.summary: Add a VNF Dependency
post.description: Adds a new VNF dependency to the Network Service Descriptor

get.summary: Returns the list of VNF Dependency for a VNF from the NSD
get.description: Returns all the VNF Dependencies only for a specific VNF specified in the NSD

delete.summary: Delete VNF Dependency from a VNF part of the NSD
delete.description: Delete the VNF Dependency only for a specific VNF specified in the NSD

put.description: Updates a VNF dependency to the Network Service Descriptor

get.summary: Gets a single VNF from the NSD
get.description: Returns the VNFD with the id specified in the URL and that is part of the specified NSD

put.summary: Update a VNFD in the NSD
put.description: Takes a Virtual Network Function Descriptor in the Request Body and updates the specified vnfd that is part of the Network Service Descriptor with id specified in the URL

delete.description: Takes the ids of the NSD and VNFD and updates the NSD

get.summary: Get Network Service Descriptor by id
get.description: Returns the Network Service Descriptor with the id in the URL

put.description: Takes a Network Service Descriptor and updates the Descriptor with the id provided in the URL with the Descriptor from the request body

delete.description: DELETE request where the id in the url belongs to the NSD to delete

get.summary: Returns the list of VNFDependency from NSD
get.description: Returns all the VNF Dependencies specified in the NSD

get.summary: Gets the list of Virtual Network Functions part of the NSD
get.description: Returns the VNFDs from the NSD with the id specified in the URL

post.summary: Add a VNFD to the NSD
post.description: Takes a Virtual Network Function Descriptor in the Request Body and adds it to the vnfd list of the Network Service Descriptor with id specified in the URL

get.summary: Retrieving all Network Service Records
get.description: Returns all Network Service Records on the specified project

post.summary: Deploying a Network Service Record from a JSON NSD
post.description: The NSD is passed in the Request Body as a json and the other needed parameters are passed as json in the bodyJson object

post.summary: Removing multiple Network Service Records
post.description: The list of ids in the Request Body specify the Network Service Records that will be deleted

delete.summary: Remove a VNF Dependency from a NSR
delete.description: Removes a VNF Dependency based on a VNFR it concerns

post.summary: Removing multiple Virtual Network Function Records
post.description: The list of ids in the Request Body specify the Virtual Network Function Records that will be deleted

get.summary: Return a single Virtual Network Function Record of a NSR
get.description: The id of NSR and the id of the VNFR are specified in the URL

put.summary: Update a Virtual Network Function Record in a NSR
put.description: Specify the ids of the VNFR and NSR which will be updated

delete.summary: Remove a single Virtual Network Function Record of a NSR
delete.description: The id of NSR and the id of the VNFR are specified in the URL

get.summary: Retrieving a Network Service Record
get.description: The id in the URL belongs to the NSR that should be retrieved

post.summary: Deploying a Network Service Record from an existing NSD
post.description: The Network Service Record is created from the Network Service Descriptor specified in the id of the URL

put.description: PUT request with the updated Network Service Record as JSON content in the request body and the id in the URL belongs to the NSR that shall be updated

delete.description: Removes the Network Service Record that has the id specified in the URL

post.summary: Resume a failed Network Service Record
post.description: The id in the URL specifies the Network Service Record that will be resumed

get.summary: Retrieve the VNF Dependencies of a NSR

post.summary: Add a VNF Dependency to a NSR
post.description: Adds a new VNF Dependency to the specified NSR

put.summary: Updates a VNF Dependency in an NSR
put.description: Updates a VNF Dependency based on the if of the VNF it concerns

get.summary: Retrieve VNF Dependencies from VNFR
get.description: Returns all VNF Dependencies that reference the specified VNFR

get.summary: Retrieve a list of Dependency objects from the NSR
get.description: Returns all the Dependency object of the specified NSR

get.summary: Returns the Virtual Network Function Records of a NSR
get.description: Returns all the VNFRs that are part of the specified NSR

post.summary: Add a Virtual Network Function Record
post.description: Add a new VNFR to an already existing NSR

post.summary: Add a VNFC instance to a random VDU of a VNFR
post.description: Adds a VNFC instance by only specifying the VNFR and the NSR

delete.summary: Remove all VNFC Instances from all VDUs
delete.description: Deletes all VNFC Instances from all VDUS in a VNFR

post.summary: Add a VNFC instance to a VDU of a VNFR
post.description: Specifies and adds a VNFC instance in the VDU inside a VNFR that is inside the NSR

delete.summary: Remove all VNFC Instances from a VDU
delete.description: Deletes all VNF Instances of the specified VDU

delete.summary: Remove a VNFC Instances from a VNFR
delete.description: Removes a single specified VNFC Instance

post.summary: Start an existing VNFC instance
post.description: Starts the specified VNFC Instance

post.summary: Stop a VNFC instance
post.description: Stops the specified VNFC Instance

get.summary: Returns the history of the VNFRs of an NSR
get.description: Returns the history of the specified VNFR

get.summary: Retrieve all installed Vim Drivers
get.description: Returns the names of all the Vim Drivers currently installed

get.summary: Download a plugin from the Open Baton Marketplace
get.description: The Plugin can be downloaded by specifying the type, name and version in the URL

get.summary: Retrieve all Projects
get.description: Returns all the created projects

post.summary: Adding a Project
post.description: Project data has to be passed as JSON in the Request Body.

post.summary: Removing multiple Projects
post.description: In the Request Body pass a list of project ids that have to be deleted

get.summary: Retrieve a Project
get.description: Pass the id of the project in the URL

put.description: The Request Body holds the Project as JSON that will be updated.

delete.description: Specify the id of the project that will be deleted in the URL

get.summary: Retrieve all Users
get.description: Returns all registered users

post.summary: Adding a User
post.description: The User data is passed as JSON in the Request Body

put.description: The current user can change his password by providing a new one
If you want to change another User’s password, you have to be an admin

get.summary: Retrieve the current User
get.description: Returns the user currently accessing

post.summary: Remove multiple Users
post.description: Removes all users part of the List of ids passed in the Request Body

delete.description: Removes the user with the id specified in the URL. Admin privileges needed!

get.summary: Retrieve a User
get.description: Retrieves a user based on the username specified in the URL

put.description: Updates a user based on the username specified in the url and the updated user body in the request

get.summary: Retrieving all Virtual Network Function Descriptors

post.summary: Adding a Virtual Network Function Descriptor
post.description: POST request with Virtual Network Function Descriptor as JSON content of the request body

post.summary: Removing multiple Virtual Network Function Descriptors
post.description: The request takes a list of ids of Virtual Network Function Descriptor that will be deleted

get.summary: Retrieving a Virtual Network Function Descriptor
get.description: The id in the URL belongs to the requested Virtual Network Function Descriptor

put.summary: Updating a Virtual Network Function Descriptor
put.description: The updated VNFD is passed as JSON content in the Request Body and the id in the URL belongs to the VNFD that will be updated

delete.summary: Removing a Virtual Network Function Descriptor
delete.description: The id in the URL belongs to the Virtual Network Function Descriptor that will be deleted

get.summary: Retrieving a Virtual Deployment Unit
get.description: The vnfdId in the URL belongs to the requested Virtual Network Function Descriptor and the vduId to the Virtual Deployment Unit inside the VNFD

get.summary: Retrieve all VNFPackages
get.description: Returns all VNF Packages onboarded on the specified project

post.summary: Adding a VNFPackage
post.description: The request parameter 'file' specifies an archive which is needed to instantiate a VNFPackage. On how to create such an archive refer to: http://openbaton.github.io/documentation/vnfpackage/

post.summary: Adding a VNFPackage from the Open Baton marketplace
post.description: The JSON object in the request body contains a field named link, which holds the URL to the package on the Open Baton Marketplace

post.summary: Removing multiple VNFPackages
post.description: A list of VNF Package ids has to be provided in the Request Body

post.summary: Adding a VNFPackage from the Package Repository
post.description: The JSON object in the request body contains a field named link, which holds the URL to the package on the Open Baton Marketplace

get.summary: Retrieve a VNFPackage
get.description: Returns the VNF Package corresponding to the id specified in the URL

put.description: The updated VNF Package is passed in the request body

delete.description: The id of the package that has to be removed in in the URL

get.summary: Retrieve a script from a VNF Package
get.description: The ids of the package and the script are provided in the URL

put.summary: Update a script of a VNF Package
put.description: The updated script has to be passed in the Request Body

get.summary: Retrieve all registered VNFM endpoints
get.description: Returns all Virtual Network Function Managers running and attached to the NFVO

get.summary: Retrieving a registered VNFM’s endpoint
get.description: Specify the id of the Virtual Network Function Manager in the URL

delete.summary: Remove a registered VNFM from the NFVO
delete.description: Specify the id of the Virtual Network Function Manager in the URL
